GSD.product_version: versions from v5.18 to before v5.18.13
GSD.description:
net: atlantic: remove aq_nic_deinit() when resume

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.13 by commit 702419db7ded2e3686fbc05040b61d7428d611d5, it was introduced in version v5.18 by commit 1809c30b6e5a83a1de1435fe01aaa4de4d626a7c. For more details please see the references link.
